name: Contract Killer Shooting City
description:
Contract Killer Shooting City 2 is a very challenging FPS sniper action game! Take the best shot to kill and eliminate every escape crime in the car. Attack enemy hiding in dust and sniper assassin rebellions with a realistic gun leaving no exit for the fierce killer because you are an army commando shot to perform the real mission. Being the city sniper show precise target hitting in this best shooter game. Get into this sniper shooting battle and prepare to be the last hope of the city. Against the sniper assassins of the crime city, you will prepare to be the best sniper hunter game.
Features
• Realistic Environment.
• Thrilling action levels.
• New and latest Sniper 3D Guns.
• High quality graphics and best sound effects
• HD Graphics.
• Sniper Training to be the Best Shooter
